posts.title: REACT AXIOS
posts.body: In this video, we are going to learn about How to set up the JSON-server for our fake APIs and use React Axios package to perform HTTP Requests in react. We will follow the RESTful API convention (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) and see how easily we do CREATE, READ, UPDATE
